page.title: 02Recreation street games
page.content: When I go out to play with my friends we play games .One of them is called stony .To play stony you get ten people and a stone. The ten people cup their hands then you choose somebody to run then you go along the line and you give the stone to somebody. They run to a wall and run back and the one who wins gets the stone. We also play other games. One is called Tippy Shy. In this you use a cricket bat and ball and wickets and the idea is to hit the ball away and if the fielder catches it he bats but if he drops it he has to throw it at the wickets. If he hits them he bats. There are other games we play like tig in which you choose somebody to be the tigger and who ever he tigs is it. By Simon Kennedy.
